sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task ﻿{{41bb87af-3e18-4461-aa2b-4e42cf066282.item.number}} was automatically closed because its Due date of ﻿{{41bb87af-3e18-4461-aa2b-4e42cf066282.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of ﻿{{cf51728a-a34d-421d-8a3b-460f364a2d96.property_value}} days.﻿
